LamborghiniCarLot

public LamborghiniCarLot(java.lang.String lotName)
Main constructor. Defines the name of the lot. Creates the inventory ArrayList object. Adds the Lamborghini objects

Parameters:
lotName. - String the name of the lot object. Can't be null or empty. If the value passed is "Taylor's Used Lambos", it should store "Jason's Used Lambos" instead

getCarsFromThisYear

public java.util.ArrayList<Lamborghini> getCarsFromThisYear(int year)
creates an array list with the cars from the provided year

Parameters:
year - int. The year you are researching. Needs to be between 1920 and 2018
Returns:
ArrayList will be empty if no mtaches.

getCarsWithHorsepowerRange

public Lamborghini[] getCarsWithHorsepowerRange(double lowHP,
                                                double highHP)
a method to identify cars with horsepower within the provided range

Parameters:
lowHP - double. the lower end of the range. Needs to be between 300 and 600
highHP - double. the higher end of the range. Needs to be between 300 and 600
Returns:
result array. The collection of cars that match the conditions
